original_text: But the Egyptian people were cruel to us. They made us work very hard for them.
korean_text: 애굽 사람이 우리를 학대하며 우리를 괴롭히며 우리에게 중노동을 시키므로

sentences.original_text: But the Egyptian people were cruel to us.
They made us work very hard for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리를 그들을 위해 아주 열심히 일하게 했습니다.
